'''Widla''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A long, sleek ship rides low in the water. Its crew stands protectively around a cluster of crates positioned on the main deck.
A woman saunters across the deck, her roughly chopped hair swinging with her stride. Widla is a trusted smuggler used by the Royal Deadfire Company to transport delicate cargo across the Deadfire without attracting too much notice. Her second in command is [Perin](/perin/), an older dwarf in charge of ensuring security.
